item.title: Video Footage Artifact Removal - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a VFX editor who can help me remove artifacts from my footage. The artifacts are from a camera setting in the video. Here is a link of the video along with JPG detailing what I want removed:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/140y4j3PhG0D6SqECdbhJYQLGEUETkzwh?usp=sharing

If you have the skills and expertise to tackle this task, please apply with your portfolio showcasing similar projects.

item.title: Youtube shorts, reels and tiktok editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone good at making short reels for youtube, tiktok and instagram which perform well. I want to be able to give you the concepts and material and you are able to run with it and make viral content.. Will be helping to manage different accounts on these platforms and cut and edit the short reels to post on them. Part time work ongoing. Much of it will be for the sport of Jiu Jitsu.. Some of it for health..

Hourly Range: $5.00-$30.00

item.title: Video editor - Upwork
item.description:
To be short listed for this project you must start your bid with “JOB-ID 32VTH”. Contacting us outside of Upwork is a violation of terms and will be reported to Upwork.

We are looking for a video editor to help us with short and log form videos . We have raw footage of short format videos and we need someone to repurpose the content and make several one minute collage of clips from 1.5-2 seconds long to make 1 minutes long videos that we can re-post to our channels . Long format is also required for YouTube at a later date .

Please provide a quote in hours and time for a one minute long video . We do not want transitions or graphics or text or voice on the screen. We will add music from tiktok to comply with their conditions

The account is savvyrickbrown on tiktok

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 01:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Thailand
click to apply

item.title: Personal Tiktok Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video creator to assist with my personal Tiktok creations. I take a lot of travel content and just can't keep up with the video creation. I'm happy to do voice over, but I need help with the creation.

This might become more regular, with the possibility of shifting this to my business.

Prefer Filipino freelancers, as I'm in Philippines very regularly for work.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 01:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Experienced Virtual Assistant Needed with Multiple Skills - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced virtual assistant to help manage various tasks related to project management, video editing, social media management, and lead generation. The ideal candidate should be organized, detail-oriented, and capable of handling multiple responsibilities efficiently.

Responsibilities:
- Manage projects using Asana, ensuring tasks are completed on time and within budget.
- Edit videos for Reels, TikTok, and other social media platforms, with the ability to handle large files and maintain high quality.
- Handle social media management for multiple profiles, including content creation, scheduling, and engagement.
- Assist in lead generation activities to drive sales for our businesses.
- Take care of miscellaneous tasks to support overall project deadlines and ensure smooth operations.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in project management, preferably using Asana or similar tools.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms, particularly Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook.
- Experience in lead generation and sales is highly desirable.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
- Attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks effectively.

Additional Information:
- This is a remote, part-time position with the potential for long-term collaboration.
- Flexibility in working hours is appreciated, but availability during business hours is required for occasional meetings and coordination.
- Please include samples of your previous work and any relevant certifications or qualifications in your application.

If you meet the above requirements and are interested in joining our team, please submit your proposal detailing your relevant experience and how you can contribute to our projects' success.

We look forward to hearing from you!


Posted On: June 30, 2024 01:08 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Virtual Assistance, Social Media Management, Video Editing, Lead Generation, Project Management
Skills: Virtual Assistance, Social Media Management, Video Editing, Lead Generation, Project Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a Pro Final Cut Video Editor [Autofocus Issues] - Upwork
item.description:
I have a 2:27 (2 minute 27 seconds) video.  Features me in a chair playing guitar.  However, it seems the camera's auto focus was on.  

I'm looking for someone who can help correct these issues.  I would say 70% of the time the camera's focus is good.  The other 30% of the time the focus goes out slightly.

The final deliverable would be the corrected video.  The only editing that is required is the correction of the auto focus issues - or rather mitigation if it cannot be fully corrected.

Feel free to let me know if you have additional questions.  


Posted On: June 30, 2024 01:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
